text: Bruce Howard Kulick (born December 12, 1953 in Brooklyn, New York), also known as Bruce H. Kulick or Bruce Kulick, is an American musician and guitarist. He is known as the lead guitarist for the rock band Kiss from 1984 to 1996. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:American rock guitarists Category:Musicians from New York City Category:American heavy metal musicians Category:Kiss (band)
title: Bruce Kulick
